name: Jan Nemec
membership:
IRU
ALICE (Alliance for Innovation in Logistics)
goal: The goal of the organisation is to safeguard and voice the interests of the Czech and Slovak road transport companies and influence the decision making process of the EU Institutions on their behalf. The organisation will also represent the companies in expert and political bodies.
interests: Business and Industry, Climate Action, Employment and Social Affairs, Environment, Research and innovation, Single market, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport
